text: The West Texas Roughnecks season was the team's eighth season as a professional indoor football franchise and second in the Indoor Football League (IFL). One of twenty-two teams competing in the IFL for the 2011 season, the Odessa, Texas-based West Texas Roughnecks were members of the Lonestar Division of the Intense Conference. ==Regular season==
